descriptionHTML:
Love your brand? Raxilwear's My Logo app enables you to place your company logo on your Android Wear watch face. For a fast and simple install, simply select your logo (image) and then select the appearance. Voilà, a branded watch! Your sales team will love this tech savvy promotional look.

Features:
- Fast and simple to install.
- Select your logo image from your device.
- Logo images are automatically resized.
- Available optional image crop feature (including the ability to crop square or rectangle).
- A savvy company branded logo appearance.

Note: Configuration of watch face must be done through the Android Wear app
